movie.longDescription: With clips from some of The King of Pop's most popular music videos, interviews with Joseph Vogel, writer of 'Man in the Music: The Creative Life and Work of Michael Jackson', and legendary producer and Motown Records founder Berry Gordy, and more, 'The Journey' tells Michael Jackson's story of massive career success, beginning with the Jackson 5, his public personal life, hit record after hit record, and his lasting influence on pop culture.
movie.title: Michael Jackson: The Journey

movie.longDescription: Justin Timberlake is a force to be reckoned with. Music industry execs, and some of the biggest radio personalities in the US lend their voices to ‘Man of the Hour’, the story of his rise from the influences of Memphis, TN, to the heights of the entertainment world, as a successful big screen actor, businessman, and solo act -- working with industry titans Pharrell Williams, Madonna, Timbaland, and more.
movie.title: Justin Timberlake: Man of the Hour

movie.longDescription: Chuckie & friends are celebrating 10 years of the Dirty Dutch musical revolution by throwing a brand new theme - 'Back To The Original Core.' Chuckie's Dirty Dutch shows are renowned for their signature 'Dirty Dutch' audience interactive DJ sets, with crowds bedazzled by a blitzkrieg of smoke, strobes and champagne.
movie.title: DJ Chuckie: Back to the Original Core

movie.longDescription: Arguably the biggest pop star in the world, Justin Bieber was once just a kid showcasing his natural talents on YouTube. 'Limitless' showcases his journey from Stratford, Ontario, Canada, to working with Usher and Scooter Braun, and ultimately, becoming the international sensation he is today.
movie.title: Justin Bieber: Limitless

movie.longDescription: She's a force in popular culture who's shared stages with the likes of Madonna and Robin Thicke. ’Unleashed’ chronicles Miley Cyrus's success from Hanna Montana, to her breakout MTV performances and beyond. Interviews from the likes of Paul McCartney, and more, shed light on her meteoric rise, love life with Liam Hensworth, and her growth as a pop artist, actress and icon.
movie.title: Miley Cyrus Unleashed

movie.longDescription: International EDM sensation Ferry Corsten invites us behind the scenes as he tours, hits the studio, and works magic on the stage. Travel across the globe with Ferry and his EDM superstar friends -- one WKND at a time.
movie.title: Ferry Corsten: WKNDR - A Year in the Life

movie.longDescription: For the Wu Heads. Take a journey with Cappadonna, in one of the only Wu-Tang documentaries narrated by a member of the world famous rap crew. Freestyles, gritty footage, interviews with Capadonna, Raekwon, Pappa Wu, Slick Rick and others, and concert footage featuring Method Man, Ghostface, RZA, GZA and the entire crew, from Wu-Tangs '8 Diagrams' tour, make Wu-Tang Saga a real treat for any fan of the Clan.
movie.title: Wu-Tang Saga
